page.title: 08T.HILTON (A DAYS ACTIVITY)
page.content: I get up around{six thirty a.m.}around the same time as my dad.I have my breakfast after I am dressed I enjoy watching the early{T.V.}programmes.I tend to dawdle a little and mum has to speed me up for school which I set off for at{8.30. } Friday morning and school starts out with English,Spellings which takes up to dinner time.Yippee.The afternoon revolves around the weather.If it is fine we have games on the playing field.When it rains we find plenty of inside work to do. The school day soon ends then I race home to get changed,and have a drink before going to the swimming baths for my lesson.My hour soon goes and this gives me time to have another drink and sandwich before changing into my cub uniform at the baths. {TIMOTHY HILTON
